attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British people are fed up with high ranking county council and local council staff earning sky high wages, some of which exceed the prime ministers annual wage at the expence of the local rate payers. we request a review of county council saleries and request these staff agree a wage reduction as these excessive burdens on the rate payer are no longer sustainable .And We the British public demand more consultation from the local authorities before any saleries  are offered to new council employees and when spending money on local ammenities and developments.We the British public have had enough of councils over spending and wasting our money.
